"Karin": "Wow, you sure did a good job! You've managed to complete all of the Stages! We've also got a heap of wonderful data from it!"
"Ah, by the way. Next time you do an Extreme Quest, it'll start from the first stage again! Just letting you know! "
"But in exchange for starting over, we're giving you a ton of Photon Crystals!"
"In any case! You also get to take items corresponding to the amount of Stage Orders you completed!"
"Pick whichever items you'd like from the Extreme Terminal. Now then. Good work!"
"Also, we're giving you some Photon Boosters, which you can trade for all kinds of rare items! So try your best next time too, okay?"
